head.title: What is Build failure: ChunkRenderError: No template for dependency: TemplateArgumentDependency?
head.description: The issue come from the fact that you have multiple webpack instance running. This means your project have 2 "webpack" dependencies inâ€¦

body:
The issue come from the fact that you have multiple webpack instance running. This means your project have 2 "webpack" dependencies in node_modules.

To find out, use

npm ls | grep webpack@

or with yarn

yarn ls | grep webpack@

If you see 2 webpack dependencies, get in touch with us, it's not a normal scenario.

Phenomic should not have this installed as it's a dev dependencies. npm install phenomic (or yarn add phenomic) should not install dev deps.

How did you install phenomic? Did you followed the setup instructions?
